story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_02:
Ever since that incident, it seems Cyrus has been
putting his plans into action.
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_03:
Sync pairs all over Pasio are falling asleep and
having terrible nightmares... And they’re not
waking up.
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_04:
We’re making sure the affected sync pairs are
getting treated at the Pokémon Center.
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_06:
When I think about what would happen if my
family were ever affected...
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_07:
Hey, everyone! Good news! We were able to
wake up all the sync pairs that were asleep
because of Darkrai!
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_09: That’s fantastic, Dawn! How’d you do that?
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_10: Together with Cresselia and her power!
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_11:
As long as we work together, we can
help everyone!
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_12:
No matter what kind of nightmares everyone is
having, we’ll make things all right again!
story_teamgalactic_01_17000/2401_1201_13: ’Cause we’re here to protect them all!
